message: I have a great product that I think you'll really like. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me in the middle?
I can do $105, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. It's a great product and I'm confident you'll love it.
I'm still a bit hesitant at $105. Would you be willing to meet me at $98?
I can see you're really interested in the product, but I've got to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $105 and $98, so I can offer you $101.50
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $100?
I'm not willing to go all the way down to $100, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer you $109, which is a bit above the middle ground we previously discussed
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still not comfortable with $109. Would you be willing to go down to $107?
I'm not willing to go all the way down to $107, but I'm willing to make one last compromise. I can offer you $111, which is a bit above your latest offer
I've gone as low as I can, but I'm still not comfortable with $111. I think we're getting close to the end, but I'll make one last offer. Would you be willing to meet me at $108?
